short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically skips the ads on http://sh.st/ links immediately.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly skips any links on http://sh.st/ and forwards to the actual site.

Source code is available at https://github.com/anka-213/chrome-shorte.st-skipper

Supported domains:
- shorte.st
- sh.st
- clkmein.com
- viid.me
- xiw34.com
- corneey.com
- gestyy.com
- cllkme.com
- festyy.com
- destyy.com
- ceesty.com
